captions.text: When we're eating by ourselves
You don't say a word
You weren't like this before
When we watch a boring movie
You used to hold my hand
until all the credits rolled up
It was you who liked me
It was you who made me like you
You're the one who started this
making my heart flutter
Now you're too lazy
to walk me home
Now you want to break up with me
Ice ice baby, I don't need
Why have you turned so cold?
Ice ice baby, fine without you
I can see I'll be the only one hurt
You're the one who followed me around
I deleted your number
You said you liked cute girls
Now you like sexy?
Days I spent in love with you
are teary reminders now
How you've changed?
I'm almost glad
It makes me mad how you played my heart
When I'm late to our date
You can't even wait 10 minutes
You used to wait before
When I get out of work late
You said it's dangerous because I'm pretty
and you came running to me
It was you who liked me first
It was you who took me home
You're the one who started this
making my heart flutter
I waited 5 days
to see you on the weekend
But your eyes are glued to your phone
Ice ice baby, I don't need
Why have you turned so cold?
Ice ice baby, fine without you
I can see I'll be the only one hurt
You used to say you love me, that I'm yours
Why did those words change so easily?
Looked at me softly, please come back
You used to be so nice
Ice ice baby, I don't need
Why have you turned so cold?
Ice ice baby, please come back
You used to be so nice
One day like any other day
In the room with lights off
One girl sits crying
Wetting her pillow 'til sunrise
One day like any other day
In the room with lights off
One girl sits crying
Wetting her pillow 'til sunrise
